data.name: TermsOfService
data.value:
❗️ To connect to our servers, you must first accept our terms:
— This service is designed for anti-censorship purposes. 🚫 Network scanning, 🚫 BitTorrent, 🚫 Hacking, 🚫 Cracking, and other similar activities are not allowed.
— Connections are designed to be used by only one person.
— If these rules get violated your account may be suspended.

data.name: TermsOfServiceDisagreeText

data.name: AddToV2RayClient
data.value: Add this link to a V2Ray client:

data.name: SubscriptionLinkIsPermanent
data.value: ✅ This is your permanent subscription link. If you change your location or purchase new subscriptions, this link will remain the same. Just remember to Update Subscription in the V2ray Client after making any changes.

data.name: AndroidTeachingText
data.value:
Android step by step guide on using Subscription Link
1- Download V2rayNG from this link: https://github.com/2dust/v2rayNG/releases (You have to download V2rayNG version 1.8+ from Github if you want to use Reality configs) 2- Tap on '🌐 Connect!' Button to get config text 3- Tap on the link to copy it 4- Open V2rayNG and tap on Menu icon on top left 5- Tap on 'Subscription group setting' 6- Tap on + icon on top right 7- On 'remark' textbox enter your desired name ie: SegVPN 8- Tap on 'Optional URL' and paste your permanent subscription link you copied at step 3 9- Tap on Check Icon on top right 10- Tap on back Icon on top left to return to the main page of V2rayNG 11- Tap on 3 dots at top right 12- Tap on 'Update subscription' and wait until your connections appear 13- Tap on a connection you want to use 14- Click on connect button on bottom right
⚠️ NOTE: Repeat steps 11 to 14 whenever your connections did not work properly.

data.name: IosTeachingText
data.value:
iOS step by step guide on using Subscription Link
1- Download FoXray from this link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/foxray/id6448898396 2- Tap on '🌐 Connect!' Button to get config text 3- Tap on the link to copy it 4- Open FoXray and tap 'Subscriptions' at the bottom menu 5- On 'name' textbox enter your desired name ie: SegVPN 6- Tap on 'URL' and paste your permanent subscription link you copied at step 3 7- Tap on 'Subscribe' and wait for a few seconds 8- Tap on 'Play' Button in front of each connection you want to use
⚠️ NOTE: Do the following steps if your connections did not work properly after some time.
1- Open FoXray and click on 'Subscriptions' at the bottom menu 2- Tap on the name of your subscription 3- Tap on 'Update' and return to Main Page
⚪️ Alternative applications: A. NapsternetV https://apps.apple.com/us/app/napsternetv/id1629465476 B. FairVPN https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fair-vpn/id1533873488 C. V2Box https://apps.apple.com/us/app/v2box-v2ray-client/id6446814690

data.name: WindowsTeachingText
data.value:
Windows step by step guide on using Subscription Link
1- Download V2rayN by following the gif below from this link: https://github.com/2dust/v2rayN/releases 2- After installing and updating, run the program as administrator 3- Tap on '🌐 Connect!' Button to get config text 4- Tap on the link to copy it 5- Click on + Icon and on 'Remarks' textbox enter your desired name ie: SegVPN 6- Click on 'URL' Textbox and paste URL you copied at step 4 7- Click on 'Confirm' 8- Select the newly created tab (In this example the name will be SegVPN) 9- Click on 'Subscription group' and click on 'Update current subscription without proxy' 10- Left click on the config you want to connect to, then hit enter 11- Check 'Enable Tun' at bottom middle
⚠️ NOTE: Repeat step 9 whenever your connections did not work properly.
⚪️ Alternative applications: A. Nekoray https://github.com/MatsuriDayo/nekoray/releases

data.name: InviteToGetMoney
data.value: 💡 Did you know: You can get 5 cents guaranteed for every friend you invite to SEGVpn! 👇 Just tap on the '✉️ Invite' button below and start making money 💸

data.name: ChangeLocationToImproveSpeed
data.value: 📡 We Noticed Something... 📶 You have used less than 1 Gigabyte of your service in the past 10 days. We want you to enjoy the full benefits of our features, so here are some suggestions to optimize your experience: 🌎 Switch your location You can get a faster and more stable connection by choosing a different location that suits your ISP and Provider better. Just tap on the ‘🔶 Change Location’ button below and explore our options. 🛡️ Use Compatible Clients SEGVpn offers state of the art, advanced and secure configs that only work with certain V2Ray clients. To find out which clients are compatible, please tap on /help 🔁 Refresh your Subscription Link We have to update our domains regularly to avoid being blocked by GFW. To keep up with our changes, go to your v2ray app and tap on ‘Update Subscription’. For more details, tap on /help. 📧 Reach out to us If none of the above solutions work for you, don’t hesitate to contact us at SEGSeed@Gmail.com and tell us your problem. Our Support Team is always ready to help you and solve any issues you may have. We are honored to keep you connected in these tough internet times 🚀 STAY CONNECTED 🚀

data.name: BuySubscriptionsWithDiscount
data.value: ⚡️ Limited offer: Don’t miss this amazing deal on subscriptions! This is a rare opportunity! You can now get our premium subscriptions for a jaw-dropping 50 to 76 percent off! Tap on the ‘🛍 Subscription’ button and claim your offer now!
